list_definition.definition: to draw (letters or other forms of script) on a surface, especially with a pen or pencil on paper

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They wrote their names on a sheet of paper
The child has learned to read and write

list_definition.definition: to compose the text of (a book, poem etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She wrote a book about dinosaurs.

list_definition.definition: to compose a letter (and send it)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has written a letter to me about this matter
I’ll write you a long letter about my holiday
I wrote to you last week.
